description: “Budget Session of Parliament begins. I hope this session is fruitful and productive. Today Rashtrapati ji addressed both Houses of Parliament. His…”
caption: instagram.com
message:
Extensive & comprehensive address by Rashtrapatiji to Parliament, listing what India achieved & what India can achieve in the years to come. 

You can watch the video of Rashtrapati ji's address here.
